channel.title: Godz of pk [ idk where to post]
channel.description:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [b][size=20pt]WELCOME TO GODZ OF PK [24/7][/size][/b]
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ABOUT THE SERVER:
- Godz of pk has only recently opened. - Godz of pk is now 24/7 with very little lag. - Godz of pk is a new server and can hold about 100 members at a time. - Godz of pk has tons of fun features for you. - Godz of pk is AllStarscape, but with loads of updates by our coding master Mike.
FEATURES:
- Tons of places - Tons of weapons have specials - Skill cape emotes - Great PKing - Awesome and kind staff members - Most items work [ elegant, void, pirate]
AWSOME COMMUNITY - AWSOME STAFF MEMBERS
STAFF LIST:
OWNER: - [glow=red,2,300]Mike[/glow]
CO_OWNERS: - [glow=red,2,300]Luke[/glow] <-- the best - Joey
ADMINS: - Final - Dylan - Flippy
MODS: - Empty - Empty - Empty - Empty
SERVER IP: [b]Godzofpk.no-ip.biz[/b] CLIENT: Use Silab
[b]PICTURES:[/b]
[b]Clan Wars Area[/b] [url=http://www.freeimagehosting.net/][img]http://img2.freeimagehosting.net/uploads/c10b89387c.jpg[/img][/url] [b] Free to play PK area - with shop[/b] [url=http://www.freeimagehosting.net/][img]http://img2.freeimagehosting.net/uploads/c09f966ac7.jpg[/img][/url]
[b]Newly updated PKBOX[/b] [url=http://www.freeimagehosting.net/][img]http://img2.freeimagehosting.net/uploads/75ead41b63.jpg[/img][/url]
[b]New shop - Updated items[/b] [url=http://www.freeimagehosting.net/][img]http://img2.freeimagehosting.net/uploads/5c2bab6abe.jpg[/img][/url]
